mapper.select: SELECT RE_SEQ, USER_ID ,RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT , RE_START , RE_END , RE_CREATE, ME_ROOM FROM RESERVATION r WHERE RE_DELFLAG = 'N' AND (TO_CHAR(RE_START, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{fulldate}, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM') OR TO_CHAR(RE_END, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{fulldate}, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM')) AND USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY RE_SEQ DESC
SELECT RE_SEQ, USER_ID ,RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT , RE_START , RE_END , RE_CREATE, ME_ROOM FROM RESERVATION r WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY RE_SEQ DESC
SELECT r.RE_SEQ, r.USER_ID, r.RE_CONTENT, r.RE_START, r.RE_END, r.RE_CREATE, r.ME_ROOM FROM RESERVATION r JOIN ATTENDS a ON r.RE_SEQ = a.RE_SEQ WHERE a.USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(RE_SEQ, USER_ID, RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT, RE_START, RE_END, RE_CREATE, ME_ROOM) VALUES(RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{re_title}, #{re_content}, TO_DATE(#{re_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{re_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + INTERVAL '1' HOUR, SYSDATE, #{me_room})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_DATE(#{re_start}||' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + (LEVEL - 1)/ 24 AS RE_TIME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE(#{re_start}||' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + (LEVEL - 1)/ 24 < TO_DATE(#{re_start}||' 17:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MINUS SELECT RE_START FROM RESERVATION WHERE ME_ROOM = #{me_room} AND RE_START BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{re_start}||' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{re_start}||' 17:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.DEPT_SEQ, R.RANKS_NAME FROM USERINFO U INNER JOIN RANKS R ON U.RANKS_SEQ = R.RANKS_SEQ WHERE USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND U.DEPT_SEQ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY R.RANKS_SEQ ASC
SELECT RE_SEQ ,USER_ID , RE_TITLE , RE_CONTENT , RE_START , RE_END, RE_CREATE ,RE_DELFLAG ,ME_ROOM FROM RESERVATION WHERE RE_SEQ = #{re_seq} AND RE_DELFLAG ='N'
SELECT u.USER_NAME,r.RANKS_NAME FROM ATTENDS a JOIN USERINFO u ON a.USER_ID=u.USER_ID JOIN RANKS r ON r.RANKS_SEQ = u.RANKS_SEQ WHERE RE_SEQ = #{re_seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTENDS a WHERE RE_SEQ = #{re_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT RE_SEQ , RE_TITLE FROM RESERVATION r WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND RE_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(RE_SEQ) FROM RESERVATION)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDS (RE_SEQ, USER_ID, RANKS_NAME, USER_NAME) VALUES( #{re_seq},#{user_id}, (SELECT RANKS_NAME FROM RANKS r JOIN USERINFO u ON r.RANKS_SEQ =u.RANKS_SEQ WHERE u.USER_ID = #{user_id} ), (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) )
